column1: Uchi////We came for a birthday dinner with a few friends
column2: and I was pleasantly surprised to see that in terms of pricing
column3: it really isn't that bad. Most of the sushi and sashimi are what you would normally pay at other sushi restaurants around Houston. However
column4: the atmosphere and environment is very warm and inviting. Front of house is helpful and courteous
column5: and if you don't have reservations
column6: waiting at the bar is just as enjoyable.
